Welcome to The B.O.S.S. import research data Documentation!
===========================================================
Introduction
------------

This is a Python package for B.O.S.S import module for Pure. It contains scripts and modules to import research output and datasets into pure using the CRUD api from pure

Contents:
---------

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents

   installation
   usage
   tests_pure_persons
   tests_researchoutput
   tests_dataset
